comments.text:
Oras, não sabes?!?! Fora uma donzela de tempos longínquos que perdera a 
honra com um caboclo definido como inadequado pela sociedade da época, cujo 
o resultado dessa ousadia fora a gravidez. O pai a expulsou de casa pra 
preservar o nome da família... Ela então, sem dinheiro para arcar com as 
despesas do bebê solicitou das amigas um amparo... Mas antes era a hora do 
chá. ;p

captions.text:
"Improbable Scenes", everybody
plays, ladies and gentlemen!

What's the deal here? You wrote
scene suggestions out there

and we'll read those
suggestions here,

and they'll perform their
ideas, for instance...

'And the queue lived
happily ever after'!

I ate a mushroom,
I'm so high, man...

Today we will learn how
to jump while firing!

Get out of the bathroom,
man, I want to use it!

Wait, I... I think I'm
stuck in the wall!

- What's the problem, Pac-Man?
- 'I see dead people'!
And somehow he managed to escape...

This is Watson, and
we're back to you, Datena!

Thank you Wasi... Wasinton...
What's your name again?

'Best excuses for not
going to a baby shower'

I don't like to see
the baby drowning...

- Why won't you come?
- I would love to, but I don't want to!

- Why aren't you going? - I'll have a
tire blowout if I go, my luck today...

Okay.
'The thoughts of an electric fan'.
